org.xbill.DNS
Interface Resolver

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleResolver, ExtendedResolver
public abstract interface Resolver

Interface describing a resolver.

Method Summary
 Message send(Message query)
          Sends a message, and waits for a response
 int sendAsync(Message query, ResolverListener listener)
          Asynchronously sends a message, registering a listener to receive a callback.
 Message sendAXFR(Message query)
          Sends a zone transfer message, and waits for a response
 void setEDNS(int level)
          Sets the EDNS version used on outgoing messages (only 0 is meaningful)
 void setIgnoreTruncation(boolean flag)
          Sets whether truncated responses will be returned
 void setPort(int port)
          Sets the port to communicate with on the server
 void setTCP(boolean flag)
          Sets whether TCP connections will be sent by default
 void setTimeout(int secs)
          Sets the amount of time to wait for a response before giving up
 void setTSIGKey(String key)
          Specifies the TSIG key (with the same name as the local host) that messages will be signed with
 void setTSIGKey(String name, String key)
          Specifies the TSIG key that messages will be signed with

sendAsync

public int sendAsync(Message query,
                     ResolverListener listener)
Asynchronously sends a message, registering a listener to receive a callback. Multiple asynchronous lookups can be performed in parallel.
Returns:
An identifier, which is also a parameter in the callback
